item.description:
Come talk about CiviCRM with other folks near you who are using it too!

Things to talk about at this meetup:

  • Upgrade to CiviCRM 3.0.x! We should make sure everyone knows how to do the upgrade so that we can all take advantage of the fantastic new features in this release!
  • We'll see what else people want to talk about, and maybe we'll pick one of the following topics depending on what people are interested in: backend database access tips and mysql primer; database backup/monitoring systems; how to set up custom fields; how to write custom searches; etc.


If you think of something specific that you'd like to talk about, please post a comment about it so that we can begin to develop a somewhat structured agenda.

If you have any questions, contact Sean Madsen at 617-283-6304.
item.name: Boston CiviCRM Meetup
